original_title: Depeche Mode: 1983 “Teenagers Growing Up, Bad Government… and All That Stuff.”
overview: "Teenagers Growing Up, Bad Government… And All That Stuff" -  While Alan Wilder becomes a full member of Depeche Mode, the band experiment with new sounds through sampling, for their third album "Construction Time Again".
tagline: Teenagers Growing Up, Bad Government… and All That Stuff.
title: Depeche Mode: 1983 “Teenagers Growing Up, Bad Government… and All That Stuff.”
